Core

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • Core.Field
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Field
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Graphical User Interface that converts the provided Sprites to a graphical representation as a Pixel Field. This class also provides methods to manipulate that board and set how the graphics are displayed.
    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    Marc Albareda
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void scroll(int x,
                   int y)
        Scrolls the whole field by the specified ammount
        Parameters:
        x - The ammount of pixels it should be horizontally scrolled (negative left, positive right)
        y - The ammount of pixels it should be vertically scrolled (negative up, positive down)
